name: Esther's German Saloon
description: German home-cooked meals and fifty-eight different beers on tap. To get more authentic, you'd need to be wearing lederhosen.

name: Robatayaki Hachi
description: Japanese food the way you like it. Fast, fresh, grilled.

menuItems.name: pasta with olives and marinated lemon

name: BBQ Tofu Paradise
description: Vegetarians, we have your BBQ needs covered. Our home-made tofu skewers and secret BBQ sauce will have you licking your fingers.

name: Le Bateau Rouge
description: Fine French dining in a romantic setting. From soupe à l'oignon to coq au vin, let our chef delight you with a local take on authentic favorites.

menuItems.name: Grilled Plantains in Spicy Peanut Sauce

name: Khartoum Khartoum
description: African homestyle cuisine, cooked fresh daily.

menuItems.name: Famous BLT on a kaiser roll with fries
Housemade pot roast with seasonal vegetable

name: Sally's Diner
description: Food like mom cooked, if you grew up in Iowa and mom ran a diner. Try our blue plate special!

menuItems.name: Pulled pork sandwich on a soft roll

name: Saucy Piggy
description: Pork. We know how to cook it. Award-winning BBQ sauce, and meat with all the trimmings.

menuItems.name: Fried goose liver with onion and bread
Halusky with sauerkraut and belly bacon

name: Czech Point
description: Make a point of trying our knedlíky and homemade soups. We have free wifi and the best desserts and coffee.

name: Der Speisewagen
description: Award-winning schnitzel and other favorites. Look for our restored food truck in the NE corner of the College St lot.

name: Beijing Express
description: Fast, healthy, Chinese food. Family specials for takeout or delivery. Try our Peking Duck!

name: Satay Village
description: Fine dining Thai-style. Wide selection of vegetarian entrées. We also deliver.

name: Cancun
description: Tacos, tortas, burritos, just the way you like them. Our hot sauce and guacamole are the best in town.

menuItems.name: Naan stuffed with spinach and lamb

name: Curry Up
description: Indian food with a modern twist. We use all-natural ingredients and the finest spices to delight and tempt your palate.

menuItems.name: Grilled Plantains in Spicy Peanut Sauce

name: Carthage
description: Wholesome food and all the rich flavor of Africa. Try our famous lentil soup.

menuItems.name: Famous BLT on a kaiser roll with fries
Housemade pot roast with seasonal vegetable

name: Burgerama
description: Grade A beef, freshly ground every day, hand-cut fries, and home-made milkshakes. We make the best burgers in town.

menuItems.name: Pulled pork sandwich on a soft roll

name: Three Little Pigs
description: Genuine East Texas barbecue. Accept no substitutes!

menuItems.name: Fried goose liver with onion and bread
Halusky with sauerkraut and belly bacon

name: Little Prague
description: We're famous for our housemade sausage and desserts. Come taste real European cooking.

name: Kohl Haus
description: East German specialties, in a family-friendly setting. Come warm up with our delicious soups.

name: Dragon's Tail
description: Take-out or dine-in Chinese food. Open late. Delivery available

name: Hit Me Baby One More Thai
description: Thai food with a youthful bar scene. Try our tropical inspired cocktails, or tuck into a plate of our famous pad thai.

name: The Whole Tamale
description: The tamale and hot sauce experts. Tamale special changes daily.

menuItems.name: Naan stuffed with spinach and lamb

name: Birmingham Bhangra
description: Curry with a metropolitan twist. Daily specials. Dine-in or takeaway, you choose.

name: Taqueria
description: Taqueria y panaderia. Birria served on weekends.

name: Pedro's
description: Pedro's has been an Alameda staple for thirty years. Our list of fine tequilas and slow-cooked carnitas will make you a regular.

name: Super Wonton Express
description: Soups, stir-fries, and more. We cook fast.

menuItems.name: Naan stuffed with spinach and lamb

name: Naan Sequitur
description: Naan and tandoori specialties, from our clay oven.

name: Sakura
description: Sushi specials daily. We serve fast, friendly, fresh Japanese cuisine.

name: Shandong Lu
description: Szechuan and Mandarin specialities with a fine dining ambiance. Our hot and sour soup is the best in town.

menuItems.name: Naan stuffed with spinach and lamb

name: Curry Galore
description: Famous North Indian home cooking. Spicy or mild, as you like it. Delivery available.

name: North by Northwest
description: Great coffee and snacks. Free wifi.

name: Full of Beans
description: We roast on premises to give you the best cup of coffee in town.

name: Tropical Jeeve's Cafe
description: Hawaiian style coffee, fresh juices, and tropical fruit smoothies.

name: Zardoz Cafe
description: Coffee bar and sci-fi bookshop. Come in for an espresso or a slice of our famous pie.
